entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Freezing Drizzle, -3.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 8:00 PM AST Sunday 05 March 2023
Condition: Light Freezing Drizzle
Temperature: -3.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.0 kPa rising
Visibility: 12.9 km
Humidity: 91 %
Wind Chill: -13
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: E 39 km/h gust 55 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or rain. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy changing to snow this evening and ending overnight then cloudy. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Snow at times heavy inland and over higher terrain. Fog patches. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind northeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: Rain. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Rain beginning near noon. Risk of freezing drizzle in the morning. Fog patches. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind northeast 20 km/h gusting to 40. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Sunday 05 March 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Rain mixed with snow. Temperature steady near plus 1.
